description: This is a paginated API that returns all the migration-task states for the specified MigrationTaskName and ProgressUpdateStream.

parameters.name: ProgressUpdateStream
parameters.description: The name of the progress-update stream, which is used for access control as well as a namespace for migration-task names that is implicitly linked to your AWS account. The progress-update stream must uniquely identify the migration tool as it is used for all updates made by the tool; however, it does not need to be unique for each AWS account because it is scoped to the AWS account.

parameters.name: MigrationTaskName
parameters.description: A unique identifier that references the migration task. Do not include sensitive data in this field.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response includes a NextToken value, that means that there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page of results, call this API again and specify this NextToken value in the request. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token will return an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Status of the task - Not Started, In-Progress, Complete.

nested_items.name: StatusDetail
nested_items.description: Details of task status as notified by a migration tool. A tool might use this field to provide clarifying information about the status that is unique to that tool or that explains an error state.

nested_items.name: ProgressPercent
nested_items.description: Indication of the percentage completion of the task.
